Javascript Code hinting

    /*
        @ arg1 : is type of Object and used for some thing
        @ arg2 : is type of Object and used for some thing
    */
    isuserLoggedin: function(arg1, arg2){
        var usercookies = PGE.util.getCookie("PGEUSERCOOKIE");
        var smsession = PGE.util.getCookie("SMSESSION");

        //if user is logged in only
        if((usercookies) && (smsession)){
            return true;
        }else{
            PGE.globalHeader.clearintervals();
            $('#timedout-warning, #timedout').modal('hide');
            return false;
        }
    }
